layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, Name of match -- less splen -- dor! Name all oth -- er names a -- bove! Glo -- rious Son of God in -- car -- nate, King of kings, and Lord of love!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus, Name of matchless splendor! Name all other names above! Glorious Son of God incarnate, King of kings, and Lord of love!
Name that to our hearts is nearest, Here the stricken soul doth hide; Name that to our hearts is dearest, As in Jesus we confide.
"Call Him Jesus!" He shall save us From the tyranny of sin; From its condemnation save us, From iniquity within.
Thanks we give, and adoration, Every day and every hour, For an uttermost salvation, Freedom from sin's guilt and power.
Jesus! sweetest note of any In the lowly pilgrim's song; Jesus! the triumphant music Of the bright angelic throng.
Earth to Him her face upraises, Knows Him as the great I AM! Heaven resounds with Jesus' praises, Glory to the bleeding Lamb!
